languages.text: "Вы должны быть благодарны, что имеете свою работу и свои раны, слуги. Кем бы вы были без них? Бесполезным отребьем".
"You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."
languages.original_text: "Вы должны быть благодарны, что имеете свою работу и свои раны, слуги. Кем бы вы были без них? Бесполезным отребьем".

traits.locale_text: "You must be grateful for being blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? A useless rabble."
"You must be grateful for being blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? A useless rabble."
"You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but useless rabble."
"You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but useless rabble."
"You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."
"You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

languages.text: "Ihr solltet dankbar sein, mit Arbeit und Verletzungen gesegnet worden zu sein. Was wärt Ihr ohne sie? Nutzloser Pöbel, sonst nichts."
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet dankbar sein, mit Arbeit und Verletzungen gesegnet worden zu sein. Was wärt Ihr ohne sie? Nutzloser Pöbel, sonst nichts."

languages.text: «Deberíais estar agradecidos por haber nacido benditos con trabajo y heridas. ¿Quién seríais sin ello? Nada más que turba inútil».
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíais estar agradecidos por haber nacido benditos con trabajo y heridas. ¿Quién seríais sin ello? Nada más que turba inútil».

languages.text: 「苦難と傷のどちらにも恵まれて感謝するのね。それがなければ、君たちは何者になれた？ただの価値のない暴徒よ」
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

traits.locale_text: 「苦難と傷のどちらにも恵まれて感謝するのね。それがなければ、君たちは何者になれた？ただの価値のない暴徒よ」

languages.text: “你们应该感谢命运赐予你们的劳作与伤痛。若是失去了这些，你们又会变成什么样子？不过是毫无价值的乌合之众罢了。”
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

traits.locale_text: “你们应该感谢命运赐予你们的劳作与伤痛。若是失去了这些，你们又会变成什么样子？不过是毫无价值的乌合之众罢了。”

languages.text: « Vous devriez être reconnaissants d'avoir la chance de travailler et même de vous blesser. Que seriez-vous autrement ? Rien d'autre que de la racaille. »
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez être reconnaissants d'avoir la chance de travailler et même de vous blesser. Que seriez-vous autrement ? Rien d'autre que de la racaille. »

languages.text: "Hem zahmetle hem de ziyanla kutsandığınız için şükretmelisiniz. Onlarsız kimdiniz? Beş para etmez ayaktakımından ibarettiniz."
languages.original_text: "You should be grateful for having been blessed with both toil and injury. Who would you be without them? Nothing but worthless rabble."
